Project

"The Bluestone Sessions"
Acoustic Recording Sessions

2 Artists. 8 Songs. Epic Results.

In 2017, Country Rebel met Drake White and Aaron Lewis in Columbus, Ohio on separate occasions to film, what would later be called "The Bluestone Sessions." With cathedral ceilings, and soulful acoustics that can only be experienced in a 115-year old church, The Bluestone was the perfect location to record two of country music's most expressive artists.

Click Above For Full Session Playlist

What I Worked On

I was still doing mostly front-end web work and graphic design for Country Rebel when they asked me if I could edit the footage they had a production team shoot at the Bluestone. I had some night club video editing experience and had taken a few editing courses in college, but this was a new type of challenge for me. One of those videos is at 17 million views on YouTube and still climbing.

The success of this session content was one of the reasons we were confident enough hire a video team and to take the production into our own hands for future sessions.
